column4: hi i have  the following problem do_wait: drmWaitVBlank returned -1, IRQs don't seem to be working correctly.
anyone has any idea about this problem
is that a question about programming, development?
i try to run rosrun rviz rviz a ros node
i try to run "rosrun rviz rviz" a ros node
it is ros (robot operating system) node available for visualizing different things
i want to visualize the point cloud from kinect
i guess you did not come to the right place
its possible but i thought it has to do with my setup, because this same node works on another computer of mine but different versions of ros
what about this http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1412915? I wonder if there is another way of fixing this error with the vblank_mode
the actual error is do_wait: drmWaitVBlank returned -1, IRQs don't seem to be working correctly. Try adjusting the vblank_mode configuration parameter.
doesnt ring a bell, cant help
it seems it has to do with this computer ubuntu setup :) but not sure how to fix it :)
basically, you need sudo for anything outside /home
